actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A resolution calling for an immediate and appropriate moratorium on the killing of polar bears.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to enter into negotiations with the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics, Canada, Denmark, Norway, and any other interested nations, with a view to obtain a treaty or other appropriate arrangement with such nations providing for an immediate moratorium on the killing of polar bears in the Arctic Sea, the Arctic circumpolar pack ice area, and their land territory.

titles.title: A resolution calling for an immediate and appropriate moratorium on the killing of polar bears.
